title: OSX buildbot is unhealthy - exempi library, and now PIL
body:
#### What is the problem?
see e.g. http://smaug.datalad.org:8020/builders/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/builds/3939/steps/nosetests/logs/stdio

exempi issue is that one which occurred first with #2360 : `ExempiLoadError: Exempi library not found.` and now consistent (including #2372)

a "new" one (which I might have just missed initial occurrence) 
```
ERROR: datalad.metadata.extractors.tests.test_image.test_image
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 664, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/metadata/extractors/tests/test_image.py", line 47, in test_image
    res = ds.aggregate_metadata()
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 562, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/distribution/dataset.py", line 436, in apply_func
    return f(**kwargs)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 523, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 470, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 523, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 458, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 414, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 482, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/metadata/aggregate.py", line 702, in __call__
    to_save)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/metadata/aggregate.py", line 205, in _extract_metadata
    paths=relevant_paths)
  File "/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/datalad/metadata/metadata.py", line 454, in _get_metadata
    mtype, ds, exc_str(e))
ValueError: ("Failed to load metadata extractor for '%s', broken dataset configuration (%s)?: %s", 'image', <Dataset path=/private/tmp/datalad_temp_test_imageEz3NrM>, 'dlopen(/Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/PIL/_imaging.so, 2): Symbol not found: _clock_gettime\n  Referenced from: /Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/PIL/.dylibs/liblzma.5.dylib (which was built for Mac OS X 10.12)\n  Expected in: /usr/lib/libSystem.B.dylib\n in /Users/datalad/buildslave/datalad-pr-dl-osx-64/build/venv-ci/lib/python2.7/site-packages/PIL/.dylibs/liblzma.5.dylib [Image.py:<module>:60]')
```
not sure the reason -- possibly new upstreams of those python modules
